A bunch of invalid things to help check that the framework handles them gracefully, These things should NOT be done in actual applications.
A nonexistant control.
A control that has a reference to a nonexistant component.
A control that has an invalid instance class.
A control that has a reference to a component that has an invalid instance class.
A control that misbehaves by throwing exceptions.
A control that has a reference to a component instance that misbehaves by throwing exceptions.
A control that has a reference to a component jsp that misbehaves by throwing exceptions.
